lead_paragraph: Banco Santander is decentralizing, in a way.
snippet: Santander is offering greater power to local units through initial public offerings of individual subsidiaries in its main markets in a strategy that began in Brazil last year and is now being considered for Britain as well as other markets, The Wall...

headline.main: Santander Said to Mull Listing Subsidiaries

abstract: Santander is offering greater power to local units through initial public offerings of individual subsidiaries in its main markets in a strategy that began in Brazil last year and is now being considered for Britain as well as other markets, The Wall Street Journal reported.
